DOC.brief_title: Impulse Control Disorders Parkinson 's Patients Treated With Pramipexole Other Agents ( DOMINION Study )
DOC.criteria: Observation Criteria : Male female outpatient , age 30 75 year age , idiopathic PD . Patients must select basis prospective recruitment plan document site , objective obtain unbiased representative sample . Patients must treat antiparkinson medication period one year great demonstrate treatment response , opinion Investigator . Patients must willing able comply study procedure . Patients must willing able give meaningful , write informed consent . This must complete prior begin study procedure , accordance GCP local legislation .
